#!/bin/bash
set -euo pipefail

SOURCE_URL="${1:-}"
INSTALL_PREFIX="${2:-/usr/local}"

if [ -z "$SOURCE_URL" ]; then
    echo "Usage: $0 <source-url> [install-prefix]"
    exit 1
fi

echo "=== Building from Source ==="
echo "Source: $SOURCE_URL"
echo "Prefix: $INSTALL_PREFIX"
echo ""

# Install build dependencies
echo "Installing build tools..."
sudo apt update
sudo apt install -y build-essential

# Download
FILENAME=$(basename "$SOURCE_URL")
echo "Downloading $FILENAME..."
wget -q --show-progress "$SOURCE_URL"

# Extract
echo "Extracting..."
if [[ "$FILENAME" == *.tar.gz ]] || [[ "$FILENAME" == *.tgz ]]; then
    tar -xzf "$FILENAME"
elif [[ "$FILENAME" == *.tar.bz2 ]]; then
    tar -xjf "$FILENAME"
elif [[ "$FILENAME" == *.tar.xz ]]; then
    tar -xJf "$FILENAME"
fi

# Find directory
DIR=$(tar -tf "$FILENAME" | head -1 | cut -d/ -f1)
cd "$DIR"

echo ""
echo "=== Configuring ==="
if [ -f "configure" ]; then
    ./configure --prefix="$INSTALL_PREFIX" || {
        echo "Configure failed. Check README for dependencies."
        exit 1
    }
elif [ -f "CMakeLists.txt" ]; then
    mkdir -p build && cd build
    cmake .. -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX="$INSTALL_PREFIX" || {
        echo "CMake failed. Check for missing dependencies."
        exit 1
    }
else
    echo "Unknown build system. Check README/INSTALL."
    exit 1
fi

echo ""
echo "=== Compiling (using $(nproc) cores) ==="
make -j$(nproc) || {
    echo "Build failed. Trying with single core..."
    make
}

echo ""
echo "=== Installing ==="
if [ "$INSTALL_PREFIX" = "/usr/local" ] || [[ "$INSTALL_PREFIX" == /usr/* ]]; then
    sudo make install
else
    make install
fi

echo ""
echo "âœ“ Build complete!"
echo "Installed to: $INSTALL_PREFIX"
EOF
